author: craigmcc
msg: Make the cookie parsing more efficient by dispensing with a StringTokenizer,
and using an ArrayList instead of a Vector.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add documentation and commented-out entries for the SingleSignOn valve (which
allows a user authenticated in one app to be recognized in all other web apps
in the same virtual host) and the RequestDumperValve debugging tool.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a simple valve that dumps request and response header and cookie
information.  This is useful in debugging problems with HTTP transactions.

msg: Please send patches as attached files
